title: Tesla expects to hike price of China-made cars in EU due to tariffs
description: Tesla plans to raise the price of its Model 3 due to E.U. import duties on Chinese-made cars, without specifying the increase. It urged customers in select European countries to order by June as the new pricing will take effect on July 1, 2024. The E.U. will impose up to 38.1% extra duties on Chinese electric cars in July, potentially sparking retaliation from Beijing to protect its interests.
